```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

1. [30 minutes] Clone the [elliptical](https://github.com/DataWookie/elliptical) package.
  * Add a function to calculate the length of the semi-minor axis, given the length of the semi-major axis and the eccentricity.
  * Add a function to calculate the area, given the length of the semi-major axis and the eccentricity.
  * Create appropriate documentation. 
  * Create some tests.
  * Rebuild the package.

2. [30 minutes] Find an existing R package on GitHub. Make a small contribution. Fork and clone the repository. Edit. Commit and push. Create a pull request (don't forget to include a polite message). Ideas for contributions:
  * correcting documentation (spelling or grammatical errors)
  * improving documentation or
  * adding test cases.
